briefdescription.para: Creates a new object in Heap space.

detaileddescription.para:
If the table of virtual functions is not initialized yet, it will be initialized.
_type
Pointer to the virtual table of the desired class. It plays the role of class name.

briefdescription.para: Deletes an object from the heap.
Checks, if a pointer is a subclass of a given class.

parameterdescription.para: pointer to the virtual table of the desired class.
if not an object of the desired class
if _self is an instance of object

simplesect.para: The function does not return if it encounters cyclic dependencies of objects (or what it takes as objects). In most cases of weired data structures it will (hopefully) fail with a null pointer dereference or a segmentation fault.
